name: ULTIMATE ARENA: SHOWDOWN
description: Fighters from across space and time compete in a nonsensical simulation of wit, might, and luck. Many will enter, one will win!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: 3.0 GHz Dual-Core or equivalent Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GTX 650 or equivalent Место на диске: 200 MB
